title: Announcement: New Episodes, Newsletter, Season 3 Announcement
itunes:title: Announcement: New Episodes, Newsletter, Season 3 Announcement
itunes:subtitle: Brand new episodes return next week! Three standalone stories from our ongoing anthology "Horizons" available starting next week.Additionally, DUST’s official third season of the podcast, Chrysalis, will release this summer - starring Corey ...
description:
Brand new episodes return next week! Three standalone stories from our ongoing anthology "Horizons" available starting next week.

Additionally, DUST’s official third season of the podcast, Chrysalis, will release this summer - starring Corey Hawkins (Straight Outta Compton, The Walking Dead)

For bonus episodes, latest news, exclusive content, and much more, sign up for the DUST newsletter at watchdust.com/listen

For weekly short films, Subscribe to DUST on YouTube.com/WatchDUST


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
